exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> R l1, l2 : R v1 : is_lim_seq u l1 v2 : is_lim_seq v l2 lim_u : R -> Prop lim_v : Rbar_locally (l1 - l2) lim_u Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?M2367 P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => ?M2363 n - ?M2364 n) eventually P" with "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun x : nat => lim_u ((fun n0 : nat => u n0 - v n0) x)) n".

In environment u, v : nat -> R l1, l2 : R v1 : is_lim_seq u l1 v2 : is_lim_seq v l2 lim_u : R -> Prop lim_v : Rbar_locally (l1 - l2) lim_u Unable to unify "Prop" with "filtermap (fun n : nat => u n - v n) eventually lim_u".

In environment u, v : nat -> R l1, l2 : R v1 : is_lim_seq u l1 v2 : is_lim_seq v l2 lim_u : R -> Prop lim_v : Rbar_locally (l1 - l2) lim_u Unable to unify "Rbar_locally (l1 - l2) lim_u" with "filtermap (fun n : nat => u n - v n) eventually lim_u".

original: intros v1 v2 lim_u lim_v. apply is_lim_seq_minus. - apply lim_u. - apply lim_v.
